body: Sometimes I really wonder if there is a cultural difference or what not with how everyone after being raped/blackmailed just seems to be keep quiet about it. I did ask when I was in Tokyo how come there wasn't a single person seemingly living on the street and I got told by a local that a bit reason is that as long as there is even a single family member alive in most cases the family will come and take the person home, with force if needed and then keep them pretty much locked up at home since it is a great shame to have someone of your immediate family or relative living on the streets since it reflects badly on you that you can't afford/make the effort/raise them/etc etc which means them living on the street is your failure. While where I am from while families will help each other once someone is 18-20 they are mostly independent. So if someone chooses to do drugs or lives on the street, most families will help or offer to help but they wont force or baby them since their adults...
Because the author made the fictional chars retarded, and unable to think even slightest logic of an infant..
Comment for the last story : I really hate a person (woman) who can be honest. Why she don't talk with her BF if she's being raped?

@tumblr.hell cuz it's Japan and not a western country, they gotta strange sense of shame and pride causing them to act the way they do. No way in hell it'll work out here, the girl will be the first to bash your brains in for trying

Ngl, really fuck hot NTR, love the genre as a whole, but for the love of GOD why is everyone in them so fuckin retarded? Holy shit, it's as if everyones brains are the equivalent of fuckin sticks covered in shit.

Like holy hell, I can get being blackmailed into it, getting raped into it, etc, but holy fuck, you dont have sex with a guy because you got caught kissing someone. (Unless it's already a family member, in which case you get freaky tag team sex). 

Like, that last guy was fuckin mentally deficient in more ways then one. How the hell do you marry a girl that got pregnant, even though you've NEVER had sex? I could create a better story than that one in 10 fuckin seconds.
